meanings.definition: To change in form or appearance
meanings.sent1: The caterpillar was transfiguring into a butterfly.
meanings.sent2: The artist was transfiguring the blank canvas into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The pumpkin transfiguring into a carriage was quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: Her smile transfigured her face into a beacon of joy.
meanings.sent5: The sunset transfigured the sky with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: To transform into something more beautiful or elevated
meanings.sent1: The ugly duckling was transfiguring into a graceful swan.
meanings.sent2: The music transfigured the atmosphere into one of pure bliss.
meanings.sent3: The plain dress transfiguring into a glamorous gown was a magical moment.
meanings.sent4: His kindness transfigured the community into a place of harmony.
meanings.sent5: The garden transfigured into a paradise with blooming flowers.
